events.description:
We're starting the year off with a new tradition! Join us for our first brunch potluck.

We'll provide the main fare, but feel free to bring your favorite brunch dish to share. Let us know if you have any dietary needs. We can't wait to see you!

This is the last brunch Peter and Ayesha will be attending before moving. Come celebrate their next adventure with us!


Weather permitting, we'll have outdoor water activities and bubbles for the kids.
Unfortunately we're sick again and need to reschedule to June 1st. Thanks for understanding!
Unfortunately we needed to cancel as we'll be out of town on the last Sunday in July, and ended up being too busy on the 20th getting ready for our trip.

Instead of our regular brunch, we'll be celebrating Millie's birthday. The party will also be moved up a week from our regular event and will start at 3pm,and no need to bring gifts or food. See more details and RSVP here!
We have a conflict on the 28th, so we'll reschedule to Oct. 5th
